  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Piano
extends Instrument
    This class represents a digital piano that has sounds.
    Version:
    5/22/2016
    Author:
    Wensdon Gao, Ashley Helfinstein
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Piano

        public Piano(java.lang.String filename,
             int x,
             int y,
             int w,
             int h)
        Creates a piano with visual presentation.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-axis position of the piano keyboard image
        y - the y-axis position of the piano keyboard image
        w - the initial width of the piano keyboard image
        h - the height of the piano keyboard image
